column5: Well here I am a board member from very early on and a number of different versions of OFC. I love this board and the community of great people here. I read this board every day at least once and often more so. I don't often post or comment, so this is why it has taken me so long to get to this milestone.  I don't fish nearly as much as I used to, so my my boat gets used much more for family day trips and cottage rentals on my favourite body of water, GBay. I have camped and fished the Moon River Basin and Massasauga PP since 1988 and just love the whole area. As a teeager, my buddy had a cottage on 12 Mile Bay just south of the Moon so that was when I first got to know and fall in love with the area. We have since been renting a cottage on 12 Mile from 2002 to present.  I don't have many pictures to post because this BB limits the file size so it is not easy to put pictures up to link to a post here.  Enjoy!  Me and the Legend!   Tubing many years ago on 12 Mile:   Fun time rock jumping with our dog Sandie lifeguarding:   Swimming out at O'Donnell Point:   The lighthouse at O'Donnell Point, notice the big line of quartz:   Sneaking into the camera shot:   The flat rocks of American Camp Island:
Definitely one of the nicest places in the province.  Thanks for sharing the photos!
Girls in bikini's.. gonna be a pilot somewhere close by!  Great recap Cast-Away!
Girls in bikini's.. gonna be a pilot somewhere close by!  Great recap Cast-Away!  WIth his Nikon P900 Super Zoom?
That was probably you flying to your cottage Wayne!
No other place like it in the country by the looks it!  Never spent any time there myself
Great little 1000th post.  Quality pics of perfect times.  Thanks.
